channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IL

item.title: Report E-2025040237
item.description:
Report E-2025040237

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-23T00:57:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-01
  • City: CHICAGO
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: LUFTHANSA CARGO AKTIENGESELLSCHAFT
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Inbound shipment. Damaged notice during breakdown. Warehouse was evacuated until clean up crew finished ans re-entry was allowed. All notification processes were followed and NRC was notified.
